text: Arcane builds are special not as special
as you but they do have a few secret
benefits have you noticed that weapons
that inflict status effects like my hand
for example have a number indicating how
much of that status effect they inflict
per hit the methods of increasing these
numbers are not only through upgrades
but also correctly using the Arcane stat
if a weapon has Arcane scaling and
inflicts either poison bleed sleep or
Madness increasing your Arcane will also
increase said weapon status infliction
best example of this is the fingerprint
Shield infusing it with bleed will
provide an Arcane scaling and if you
increase your Arcane it will increase
both the bleed and Madness buildups also
Arcane scaling weapons that can be
buffed with status grease such as the
Ripple Crescent Halbert or the Ripple
blade will have much more potent
buildups than non-arcane scaling weapons
I get that your monkey brain loves them
but not everything in life is unab
bongas sometimes
